pageContext.claim: “She is a third rate reporter who has nothing going. A Fake News ‘journalist’ [responding to a tweet from Maggie Haberman, who accurately quoted Trump saying that he wanted governors to be ‘appreciative’].”
pageContext.analysis: Trump at a news briefing said he would like for governors to be appreciative of the federal government's response to covid-19. Many journalists accurately pointed out that quote, which upset Trump.
